name: MotoLadrones - beware of thieves motorcycle
description:
Play the most fun game and free.

HOW TO PLAY
Tap and release the screen for calculate the path of the truck, trying to get between the Green marking on the fear.

The goal of the game is to just scare to thieves.. Don´t crash them !

You don't need to hit the Motorcycles thieves, just come to them to scare them and they slide on the road.
